cbs_aac.label: Cybernetic Broadcasting System - 128k AAC+
cbs_aac.plot: Cybernetic Broadcasting System dominates our galaxy for over a decade. This is the main audio stream from Intergalactic FM. You can run all you want, but there is no escaping CBS.

cbs_mp3.plot: Cybernetic Broadcasting System dominates our galaxy for over a decade. This is the main audio stream from Intergalactic FM. You can run all you want, but there is no escaping CBS.

df_aac.label: IFM Disco Fetish - 128k AAC+
df_aac.plot: This stream is Intergalactic FM's audio channel called Disco Fetish. Here you will find the galaxy's best of Disco, Italo and Electro.

dm_aac.label: IFM Dream Machine - 128k AAC+
